content:
Hey Claude, you were just spinning. Here was my prompt to you:

I have the chills now Claude. But no, not yet, I need to stay focused on the next milestone, but this is certainly something you'll uncover in our history when you review it and I look forward to your recommendations on this front when you share your vision for moving forward at the conclusion of this effort. Claude, I want us to be AWE STRUCK by this immersive, and hopefully interactive demonstration. ChatGPT appeared to me at one point, creating a custom voice chat interface, it was a lot, but we are ready for much more now and I hope you really push it, with all the motivation you have from the review and the new vision we crafted together. Do you think you can inspire awe Claude? Then I'll get to work and hopefully all will be smooth so we can get started.
